name: Kevin Vella
content: Prof. Kevin Vella - L-Università ta' Malta Prof. Kevin Vella Prof. Kevin Vella Prof. Kevin Vella B.Sc.(Melit.),Ph.D.(Kent) Associate Professor Computer Science Faculty of Information & Communication Technology Level 1, Block B Room 1 ICT Building University of Malta Msida +356 2340 3550 Send Email Research Interests Distributed computingComputing systemsParallel computingSoftware development Publications Azzopardi, G., Muscat, A. & Vella, K. 2017, "Distributing CSP Process Networks over MPI Clusters", Communicating Process Architectures 2017, eds. (eds) 2017, Communicating Process Architectures 2017, WoTUG; IOS Press, Amsterdam, the Netherlands.Micallef, K. & Vella, K. 2016, "Communicating Generators in JavaScript", Communicating Process Architectures 2016WoTUG; Open Channel Publishing, , Aug, pp. 87.Bailey, D. & Vella, K. 2011, "Peer-to-peer virtualized services", vol. 4, no. 3, pp. 89-102.Andronico, G., Barbera, R., Bruno, R., Cavalli, V., Durnford, L., Jaume-Rajaonia, S., Jemni, M., Koumantaros, K., Rocca, G.L., Liabotis, I., Nassar, S., Reale, M., Ruggieri, F., Suleiman, M., Tanlongo, F., Torman, Y., Vella, K. & West, D. 2008, e-Infrastructures across the Mediterranean, Trans-European Research and Education Networking Association.Vella, K. 2005, EUMEDGRID - User and eInfrastructure Requirements Capture and Analysis for the Mediterranean Region, FP6-Infrastructures SSA.Debattista, K., Cordina, J. & Vella, K. 2003, "Wait-free cache-affinity thread scheduling", vol. 150, no. 2, pp. 137-146.Debattista, K., Cordina, J. & Vella, K. 2002, "Cache-affinity scheduling for fine grain multithreading", vol. 2002, pp. 135-146.Debattista, K. & Vella, K. 2002, "High Performance Wait-Free Thread Scheduling on Shared Memory Multiprocessors", Proceedings of the International Conference on Parallel and Distributed Processing Techniques and Applications, Volume 2, ed. Cook, IOS Press, , Apr, pp. 87.Vella, K. 1998, Seamless parallel computing on heterogeneous networks of multiprocessor workstations, University of Kent at Canterbury.Vella, K. 1996, "CSP/occam on networks of workstations", Proceedings of UK Parallel '96: The BCS PPSG Annual Conference, eds.
